name: BattleBomb
description:
Every 15 seconds your actions get mirrored.  Place your bombs strategically and blast your opponent away!

This is an entry for the Gamedev.js Jam 2021 GameJam with the theme 'mirror'.

It plays like a combination of battleships and bomberman. Let me know what you think of this game, I'd love to hear your feedback! devlog of this jam coming soon on my YouTube channel
